long_description: The women's Gregory J63 Pack is ready to hit the trail and take you comfortably into the wilderness, with plenty of room for everything you need on your next multiday backpacking trip. Ventilated back panel, women-specific harness and wrap-over padding on the hipbelt offer comfort and stability for the long haul. Die-cut foam on the harness and hipbelt adds breathability and decreases weight. CrossFlo(TM) DTS Suspension provides cooling airflow across the back without sacrificing load transfer; wire X-Frame transfers load weight to the lumbar pad and hipbelt. Top-loading main compartment features a quick-draw closure and floating top lid ; U-shaped front zipper makes it easy to access the pack's depths. Interior sleeve with port accommodates a hydration reservoir (sold separately). Front bucket pocket and zippered pocket, 2 exterior stretch water bottle pockets and dual hipbelt pockets make it easy to organize and access essentials. The women's Gregory J63 Pack features hideaway axe/trekking pole loops with secure attachments, side/bottom compression straps and an integrated, color-matched rain cover.
short_description: The women's Gregory J63 Pack is ready to hit the trail and take you comfortably into the wilderness, with plenty of room for everything you need on your next multiday backpacking trip.
